review: My wife and I have really enjoyed our Fire Stick.  We use it with our Sony 47" in the bedroom, which is a Smart TV, but this is simply more convenient and brings the Google TV integration into our bedroom.  Love being able to swipe from our phone just about any media we want, and then access additional Apps that aren't on the TV.  It does come with a power USB cord that can be used to power the stick from the TV, rather than the wall.  That said, it does take time to boot up as it's only powered when the TV is on.  We have the Asus Cube in the living room which is also fantastic, and I've used the Chromecsast.  The thing that I like about the cube is that it has a mouse pointer option and a Qwerty keyboard on the back of the controller.  The thing I like about the Fire Stick is that it is very Amazon friendly and the user interface is similar to that of Netflix.  Other than that, they are all quite similar and you can't go wrong with any of them.  Enjoy!
